Entries.Aideen_103: Why, Mx @! Are you wishing to court me?$7#$b#Well, you do exude a quaint rural charm.$1#$1#$b#And I have certainly grown fond of you. But love? Well, perhaps our tale is a slow burn, rather than a quick spark, yes?$7
Entries.Ai2_2: Oh, aren't you Mx.Cynical.#$b#You're right, of course. Pelican Town is hardly Paradise Bay.#$b#Yet the peace might be an attraction in itself, don't you think?

Entries.rejectNPCA: Too soon, sunshine, I'd rather we got to know each other first.$1

Entries.Mon: You're a long way from home, aren't you cotter? Don't get lost.
Entries.fall_Tue: Can't resist coming up here, can you cotter?#$b#What's the attraction? You better not be looking to steal my goats.$a#$e#I'd have you for breakfast if you so much as tried!$1
Entries.winter_Sun2: You got some woollen socks, cotter?#$b#Ain't nothing like goat wool to keep the feet warm.$1
Entries.summer_Fri8: You know @, I reckon I knew your grandfather.$1#$b#Solid fellow, reliable. Not afraid to get his hands dirty.#$e#The world needs more people like him... like you... people who get stuff done, instead of whistling into the wind.
Entries.winter_Fri8: Ah, it's good to see you, @.#$e#Lonely? Nah, not me... although I gotta admit - it's good to have someone to talk to.
